Description: 
-------------------- 
Cars 2: The Game offers players within the International Training Centre CHROME (Headquarters Operations Command Recognition and espionage motorized), choose from over 20 different characters and train to become world-class spy. As part of its international training, participate in a simulation of dangerous missions with high-tech devices to avoid and reduce opponents. 
Based on computer-animated Pixar Cars 2: The Video Game follows the exploits of characters Lightning McQueen and Mater car, and to train in a secret facility known as chromium, short for Headquarters Operations Command Recognition Motorized and espionage. They are joined by Finn and Shiftwell McMissile Holley in his bid to become the car equivalent of the spies. The game introduces a series of missions to complete cheerful, as use of gadgets for each car to escape or to stop their rivals. It will also be able to perform stunts like the reverse driving air tricks, and two wheels driving the objectives to complete. Cars 2: The Video Game also interacts with the free-to-play World of Cars Online, allowing players to unlock rewards in both versions of the specific tasks.
